item.title: Bitcoin Is Nudging $6,000 As Ethereum Rockets--Here's Why
item.description: Bitcoin Is Nudging $6,000 As Ethereum Rockets–Here’s Why [<href=“https://www.forbes.com/sites/billybambrough/2019/05/07/bitcoin-is-nudging-6000-as-ethereum-rockets-heres-why/” target="_blank>read more] - Bitcoin has come close to crossing the psychological $6,000 mark as a so-called crypto spring continues to bolster digital tokens across the board, with ethereum, the world’s second largest cryptocurrency by market value, making double-digit gains.The bitcoin… [+4549 chars]

item.title: Facebook 'Has Lit A Fire' Under Bitcoin And Crypto
item.description: Facebook ‘Has Lit A Fire’ Under Bitcoin And Crypto [<href=“https://www.forbes.com/sites/billybambrough/2019/05/08/facebook-has-lit-a-fire-under-bitcoin-and-crypto/” target="_blank>read more] - Facebook, the world’s largest social media network, boasting more than two billion users across its various platforms, is ramping up its plans to launch a rival to bitcoin following reports it’s looking to get venture capital firms to invest in its cryptocurr… [+3698 chars]
